coverage_details.vaccination: Covered up to Annual Limit (including MOH Schedule, Seasonal, Flu and Hajj Vaccination)
coverage_details.optical_frame: Frame Limit--SR1,500.00 (as part of optical limit)
coverage_details.psychiatric: SR 50,000.00 (Special Note: Acute and non-Acute Psychiatric covered up to 15,000 SR per special instruction)
coverage_details.dental_general: Covered (Gum treatment covered, scaling twice per year per special instruction)
coverage_details.acquired_heart_valves_disease: SR 150,000.00 (Max SR 70,000 during the term per special instruction)
coverage_details.congenital: Covered - Up to Annual Limit (Non-life threatening up to annual limit per special instruction)
coverage_details.optical: SR 1,500.00 (Frame limit up to optical limit; contact lens not mentioned for this class)
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: Standard pre-approval protocol. No pre-approval required for outpatient & inpatient services except outpatient services with special limits.
coverage_details.special_instructions: 4 Health lounges per policy period; Artificial limbs up to annual limit; Dental includes crown and bridges up to dental limit; Medication limit equals pre-authorization approval limit; Routine doctor visit covered once per year; Frame limit up to optical limit; Gum treatment covered; Non-life threatening congenital to annual limit.

coverage_details.checkup: Not Covered (but employee annual med check-up up to SR 2,500 covered per special instruction)
coverage_details.vaccination: Covered up to Annual Limit (including MOH Schedule, Seasonal, Flu and Hajj Vaccination)
coverage_details.optical_frame: Frame Limit--SR1,500.00 (as part of optical limit; frame limit up to optical limit for all classes; contact lenses covered for VVIP)
coverage_details.psychiatric: SR 50,000.00 (Special Note: Acute and non-Acute Psychiatric covered up to 15,000 SR per special instruction)
coverage_details.dental_general: Covered (Gum treatment covered, scaling twice per year per special instruction)
coverage_details.acquired_heart_valves_disease: SR 150,000.00 (Max SR 70,000 during the term per special instruction)
coverage_details.congenital: Covered - Up to Annual Limit (Non-life threatening up to annual limit per special instruction)
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-authorization required for VVIP members. No pre-approval required for outpatient & inpatient services except outpatient services with special limits.
coverage_details.special_instructions: 4 Health lounges per policy period; Annual medical check-up for VVIP employees up to SR 2,500; Artificial limbs up to annual limit; Contact lenses covered; Dental includes crown and bridges up to dental limit; Medication limit equals pre-authorization approval limit; Gum treatment covered; Scaling twice a year for VVIP; Non-life threatening congenital to annual limit.
